createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tmp_pacu_liquid_temp set createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempContent = #{tempContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createName = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempName = #{tempName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempType = #{tempType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tempId = #{tempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from( select
from tmp_pacu_liquid_temp where 1 = 1 and beid = #{searchLiquidTempFormBean.beid}
and ((createUser = #{searchLiquidTempFormBean.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = '1') or type = '2') ) a where 1 = 1
AND ${filter.field} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{filter.value}),'%')
